pages.text: Makarkinia is a genus of kalligrammatid lacewing described from Crato Formation, Early Cretaceous of Brazil. It is the largest member of kalligrammatid with wingspan close to 30 cm. Although fossils are fragmentary, at least some species are identified to have eyespots.
